select
deposit_bank_name as depositBankName,
D.bank_name as withrawalBankName,
deposit_account_num depositAccountNum,
withrawal_account_num withrawalAccountNum,
tran_num tranNum,
tran_date tranDate,
withrawal_name withrawalName,
deposit_name depositName,
tran_amount tranAmount
from (select B.bank_name as deposit_bank_name,tran_num, deposit_account_num,withrawal_account_num,deposit_name,withrawal_name,deposit_bank_code,withrawal_bank_code,tran_amount,tran_date from transaction_history A, bank_code B where A.deposit_bank_code = B.bank_code and phone_number=#{phoneNumber}) C, bank_code D where C.withrawal_bank_code = D.bank_code order by tranNum
